useCase.name: ALFRED Voice Recognition Use Case
useCase.description: This use case describes the Voice Recognition feature of the ALFRED device.

preconditions.precondition: The ALFRED Device must be activated.

successEndConditions.condition: Voice recognition successfully processes and performs requested actions.

useCase.trigger: Instruction received to activate the ALFRED Device with voice command.

mainSequence.step: Older Person activates the ALFRED Device.
ALFRED checks if voice recognition is set up.
Older Person provides voice samples for setup.
Proceed with processing and setting up voice recognition functions.
Older Person is confirmed of the successful setup.
Older Person issues a voice command.
Perform the action requested upon voice verification.
